name: @cspell/dict-public-licenses
description: Common Public Licenses dictionary for cspell.

scripts.build: yarn run generate && yarn run compile
scripts.compile: cat source-files.txt | xargs cspell-tools-cli compile --merge public-licenses -o .
scripts.conditional-build: yarn run --silent checksum || yarn run build && yarn run gen-checksum
scripts.test-dict: cat source-files.txt | xargs cat | cspell -v -c ./cspell-ext.json --local=en --languageId=* stdin
scripts.gen-checksum: cat source-files.txt source-dependencies.txt | sort -u | xargs shasum > checksum.txt

author: Jason Dent
